title: 20: S3E20 –"An Instruction in Evil" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you five terrifying tales from authors Blair Daniels, Juan Martinez, HazMatGuy, C.K. Walker, and Matt Dymerski, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about ominous occupations, timeless tragedies, cursed computers, lurid local legends, and ruined realities. See full episode details, including the text of the featured stories, here: https://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/series/scary-stories-told-in-the-dark/s3e20
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
